name: MTLVisibleFunctionTable
desc: A table of shader functions visible to your app that you can pass into compute commands to customize the behavior of a shader.

items.name: func setFunction(MTLFunctionHandle?, index: Int)
items.desc: Sets a table entry to point to a callable function.

items.name: func setFunctions([MTLFunctionHandle?], range: Range<Int>)
items.desc: Sets a range of table entries to point to an array of callable functions.
